name: voicemeasure
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice measure
des: This skill will be used to assist users in the kitchen. The user will be able to say in various forms how many cups they would like of a certain substance, such as rice. This measurement is then saved by Alexa to remember and hand down to an Arduino in the future.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
